my_computer_window.name: Name
my_computer_window.about_me_text: Hi, my name is Jo√£o Victor, I'm 23 years old and I'm a full-stack developer with a degree in Computer Science. I've always been fascinated by the world of technology, always trying to understand how the games I played worked, which was my main motivation to start programming. I currently work as a full-stack developer and I'm always looking for a new challenge or task to put my skills into practice and to learn something new.
